Package model

Class GameStatistic

java.lang.Object
model.GameStatistic
public class GameStatistic extends Object
The GameStatistic class is responsible for gathering and displaying statistics for a series of AI-driven games in the King of Roses game. It tracks various metrics.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    GameStatistic.AIStatistic
    The AIStatistic class is responsible for tracking and displaying statistics for a single AI.

    • GameStatistic

      public GameStatistic(AIData blueAIData, AIData redAIData, int gameNumber)
      Constructs a GameStatistic instance with the specified AI data and number of games.
      Parameters:
      blueAIData - The AI for the blue player.
      redAIData - The AI for the red player.
      gameNumber - The total number of games to be played.
